column3: 2015 at Joe Jackson Heights Funeral Chapels
column4: 719 Loring at Cortez from 5 p.m. to 9 p.m. First rosary will be recited at 5 p.m. by the Catholic Daughters of America; followed by a rosary at 7 p.m. recited by La Sociedad de Damas de Cristo Rey. Funeral services will be held Saturday
column6: 2015 departing the funeral home at 9:40 a.m. to Christ the King Catholic Church for a Mass of Christian Burial at 10:00 a.m.
